Questions.question: Why do you want to work at LawnStarter?
Questions.answer: LawnStarter's focus on innovation in the landscaping industry resonates with my passion for using technology to solve real-world problems. The opportunity to contribute to a scalable platform and impact a tangible service like lawn care is exciting. I'm particularly drawn to the blend of backend API development and frontend React work described in the job description.

Questions.question: Describe your experience with Python and React.
Questions.answer: I have experience developing robust backend APIs using Python, particularly with frameworks for data processing. My frontend skills are strong, with extensive experience building complex UIs using React and related tools like Redux. My projects like Animedia, Bambino and Dolores, as well as my work at Sony, demonstrate my ability to build comprehensive applications from backend to frontend, utilizing relevant skills.

Questions.question: Tell us about a time you automated a workflow successfully.
Questions.answer: At Sony, as Environmental Manager, I automated tasks related to non-production environment management using scripting. This ensured consistent environment states, reduced manual intervention, and improved developer and QA team efficiency. By automating these processes, I significantly streamlined environment provisioning and maintenance, freeing up valuable time for the team.

CoverLetter:
Dear LawnStarter Hiring Team,

I am writing to express my strong interest in the Software Engineer position at LawnStarter. Having followed LawnStarter's growth and innovative approach to the landscaping industry for some time, I'm particularly excited by the opportunity to contribute to a company that is revolutionizing a traditional sector with technology.

My background in software engineering, particularly my experience with Python, React, and cloud infrastructure, aligns well with the requirements outlined in the job description. In my previous role as a Tech Lead Engineer at Sony Pictures Entertainment, I designed and architected a business application for secure delivery of sensitive legal documents, leading sprint planning and overseeing production issue resolution. My responsibilities included modernizing a legacy Angular.js and Java Spring Boot codebase, upgrading frameworks, and remediating security vulnerabilities.

Prior to that, as a Software Engineer at Sony, I developed core business logic for backend billing and finance systems using Java Spring Boot and enhanced user experience by developing advanced UI features with Angular. I also served as an Environmental Manager, ensuring the stability of non-production environments.

My projects showcase my proficiency in full-stack development. For example, in the "Animedia" project, I utilized GraphQL for API interactions, created database schema designs with Prisma, and implemented user authentication with NextAuth. Similarly, in "Bambino," I designed a mobile-first baby management system with TailwindCSS and integrated Firebase Authentication. The "Dolores" project particularly highlights my ability to optimize backend performance at scale, where I ETL'd over 10 million records with PostgreSQL, implemented Redis data caching, and deployed on AWS EC2, achieving a 60ms average response time with 0% error rate under heavy stress testing.

I am proficient in a wide range of technologies, including Node.js, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, AWS, Docker, and various testing frameworks such as Jest and React Testing Library. I am confident that my skills and experience make me a strong candidate to contribute to LawnStarter's engineering team and help build scalable APIs, automate workflows, and improve reliability at scale.

Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss my qualifications further.

Sincerely,

Yasin Khan

Questions.question: Why are you interested in GreenTech?
Questions.answer: I'm drawn to GreenTech because of the focus on sustainable solutions and the opportunity to contribute to a company making a positive impact. Your need for a backend developer to maintain cloud infrastructure and optimize API performance strongly aligns with my skills and experience in designing scalable systems. I'm eager to apply my expertise in optimizing performance and ensuring reliability within a company committed to environmental responsibility.

Questions.question: Explain your experience with cloud platforms.
Questions.answer: I have experience managing cloud infrastructure using AWS, Firebase, Netlify, and Heroku. In my previous role at Sony, I oversaw all non-production environments, ensuring stability and efficient resource utilization. For my personal project Dolores, I deployed a backend on AWS EC2, horizontally scaled it, and load balanced with NGINX to handle high traffic. I am confident in my ability to maintain and optimize cloud resources at GreenTech.

Questions.question: Describe a backend project you are proud of.
Questions.answer: I'm particularly proud of the Dolores project, where I optimized the backend to handle a massive influx of users for an existing frontend. I ETL'd over 10 million records with PostgreSQL, implemented Redis caching, and deployed on AWS EC2, achieving a 60ms average response time with 0% error rate under heavy load testing. This project demonstrates my ability to not only build robust systems but also significantly improve performance and scalability in demanding environments, skills that would be invaluable at GreenTech.

CoverLetter:
Dear GreenTech Hiring Team,

I am writing to express my enthusiastic interest in the Backend Developer position at GreenTech. I have been consistently impressed by GreenTech’s commitment to sustainable solutions, and I am eager to contribute my backend expertise to a company making such a positive impact. The opportunity to optimize API performance and maintain cloud infrastructure deeply resonates with my passion for building robust and scalable systems.

In my role as Tech Lead Engineer at Sony Pictures Entertainment, I architected a secure legal document delivery application, demonstrating my ability to design and implement complex backend solutions. I have extensive experience developing core business logic using Java Spring Boot and modernizing legacy codebases. My hands-on experience includes a complete redesign and upgrade of an Angular.js and Java Spring Boot application, remediating security vulnerabilities and improving performance.

My technical skills align well with the requirements of this role. I am proficient in Python, Node.js, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and AWS. My project, Dolores, showcases my ability to optimize backend performance to handle high user traffic. I successfully ETL’d over 10 million records with PostgreSQL, implemented Redis data caching, and deployed the application on AWS EC2, achieving an average response time of 60ms for 10,000 clients/sec with 0% error rate under stress testing. Additionally, I have experience with Docker and various testing frameworks, ensuring code quality and efficient deployment. My full-stack project, Animedia, further demonstrates my expertise in API development using GraphQL with Prisma and deploying through Supabase.

I am confident that my skills and experience make me an ideal candidate for this position. I am eager to learn more about GreenTech and discuss how I can contribute to your team's success.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,

Yasin Khan
